summary: A set of helper utilities for command-line applications, offering lazy file opening, safe stream flushing, and convenient wrappers around standard input/output streams, as well as functions for echoing text, formatting filenames, and retrieving environment-specific paths and arguments.
business_intent: To simplify and stabilize file and stream handling in CLI tools, providing cross‑platform support for lazy I/O, safe flushing, and consistent text output, thereby reducing boilerplate and error handling for developers.
